subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] 45-sec condensed EVPM conversation
author: Stefan Bion
full_text:
Hi Margaret,

> I figured at this point, the closest to a two-way conversation I could
> get would be to shorten the time between listening to what has been
> said.

Yes, I can remember that this idea had been discussed here or somewhere
else recently.

> The purple deer comment made me laugh too (by they way, Arthur told me
> purple deer eat apples - LOL), and the way he repeated, "I told you
> purple deer" made me laugh too ... I wondered if perhaps he'd gotten a
> little frustrated with me.

I don't think so. Perhaps they were ROTFL, too! :))

Stefan
